EmailTemplate.subject: Virtual Payments in Healthcare Driving Cost Savings
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
The migration to electronic payments is rapidly building momentum as the Healthcare industry reacts to the Affordable Care Act. Research indicates that 80-90% of payment transactions are historically made by paper check. A significant transformation is under way.
WEX Bank is a leading provider of commercial payment processing. WEX Virtual offers a paperless alternative to reimburse providers that is faster and more efficient than check, and offers more data capabilities than ACH. We pioneered this payment technology in 2000 and processed over $31 billion in commercial payments in 2012.
WEX Virtual can help you realize these key benefits:
· Streamline and automate payments and reconciliations
· Earn revenue share on payments
· Lower operational costs, averaging a minimum of $10 reduction per transaction
· No-cost, straightforward integration with existing systems
· Virtually eliminate fraud risk via transaction specific, one-to-one payment process
· Increase payment visibility and insight, through extensive invoice-level data capture and robust reporting features
I’ve attached a brochure which highlights some of the program features. Ideally, I’d appreciate the chance to meet with you and your colleagues to discuss the program and how it can help {!Account.Name} continue to excel in your field of processing and paying claims. My contact information can be found below, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
